property.name: Rules
property.value: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); You may look at the top card of your deck at any time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Stealth: (Can't protect against this character.); When Ashi enters play, look at the top card of your deck. You may put it on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Sabotage: Resource (This ally can attack opposing resources.); When Lashan sabotages a resource, destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); You can't discard cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Ally cards in your hand are instant.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Sabotage: Attached Ability (This ally can attack opposing attached abilities.); When Tibrana sabotages an ability, gain control of it. You may attach it to another he

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Sabotage: Quest (This ally can attack opposing quests.); When Jitaen sabotages a quest, turn it face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Stealth: (Can't protect against this character.); When Kedryn deals combat damage to an ally, destroy that ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); When Khorbus deals combat damage, put him from play into his owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scryer Reputation; When Mythras enters play, target opponent gains control of him. Mythras can't attack.; At the end of your turn, destroy an ally in your party other than Mythras. If you can't, destroy Mythras.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Sabotage: Weapon (This ally can attack opposing weapons.); When Nealos sabotages a weapon, exhaust it. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Sabotage: Armor (This ally can attack opposing armor.); When Salvan sabotages a player's armor, exhaust all of that player's armor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Sabotage: Equipment (This ally can attack opposing equipment.); When Zaelan sabotages an equipment, put it into its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scryer Reputation (can't put Aldor cards in your deck); If you would draw a card, draw two instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that would be dealt.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Arazzius attacks, each player destroys an ally in his party.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of your turn, destroy all non-Demon allies

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a player plays a card, Fel Cannon deals 2 fire damage to that player's hero.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Long Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.); When Razorsaw enters play, he deals 4 ranged damage to target ally in your party. When Razorsaw leaves play, he deals 4 ranged damage to target ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Elusive.; At the start of your turn, each player rolls a die. If two or more players roll the same number, destroy Robotic Homing Chicken and all allies in those players' parties.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protector; Allies not named Shattrath City Peacekeeper have -1 ATK.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, the player with the most resources destroys one of them. If two or more players are tied, you choose which one destroys a resource.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Activate] > Remove target card in a graveyard from the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Activate] > Double target weapon's ATK this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Activate] > Each of your weapons has +1 ATK this turn.; [Activate] > Each of your armor has +1 DEF this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When an ally in your party is destroyed, each other player destroys an ally in his party.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 3, Exhaust your hero > Target hero or ally has -3 health this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero has protector while you have five or more equipment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a resource enters play, put 2 damage on its controllers hero.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When an ally in your party attacks, you may exhaust target armor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you strike with a weapon, you may ready an ally in your party

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Activate] > Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally. Use only if you have seven or more cards in hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, if a player has fewer cards in hand than each other player, he draws a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Platinum Shield of the Valorous has +1 DEF for each face-down resource you have.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Friendly Druids and Rogues have stealth. (Can't protect against them.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your hero heals damage from a friendly ally, it also heals that much from itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wastewalker Tunic has +5 DEF while your hero is attacking an exhausted hero or ally.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Druid, Hunter, Paladin, Rogue, Shaman, Warrior

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you play a weapon, ready your hero.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent can't draw more than one card per turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Activate], Exhaust X of your equipment > Your hero heals X damage from itself.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Druid, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Shaman, Warlock

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you play an ability, ready your hero.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your other Axes have +2 ATK.; Your hero has dual wield. (Can have a second one-handed Melee weapon instead of an Off-Hand equipment. Can strike with a second Melee weapon during the same combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of your turn, if no damage was dealt with Blade of Unquenched Thirst this turn, destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you control a Form, your hero has +2 ATK while attacking and each of your armor has +2 DEF.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 3, [Activate], Destroy The Bringer of Death > Destroy all abilities, allies, and equipment. Use only on your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Crimson Shocker enters play, your hero may deal 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exhaust your hero > Target player draws a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero has dual wield. (Can have a second one-handed Melee weapon instead of an Off-Hand equipment. Can strike with a second Melee weapon during the same combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you strike with Demonslayer, you may destroy target Demon ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a hero or ally in your party would heal damage, it heals that much +1 instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an ally enters play under an opponent's control, it loses and can't have powers until the start of that opponent's next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hemet's Elekk Gun has +4 ATK while your hero is in combat with an ally with cost 5 or more.; When you strike with Hemet's Elekk Gun, your hero has long-range this combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of your turn, if no damage was dealt with Hungering Bone Cudgel this turn, destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When combat damage is dealt with Nexus Torch to a defending hero, that hero's controller discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you draw a card, put a verse counter on Runesong Dagger.; 1, Remove three verse counters > Your hero deals 3 arcane damage to target ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a card or effect you control would cause an opponent to discard a card, he discards a random card instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Singing Crystal Axe enters play with four slow counters.; You pay 1 more to strike with Singing Crystal Axe for each slow counter.; When you strike with Singing Crystal Axe, remove a slow counter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you strike with Skyfire Hawk-Bow, your hero has long-range this combat. (Defenders deal no combat damage to it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Terokk's Quill has +4 ATK while your hero is defending.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Damage that would be dealt with Wand of Eternal Light is unpreventable.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your other daggers have +1 ATK.; Your hero has dual wield. (Can have a second one-handed Melee weapon instead of an Off-Hand equipment. Can strike with a second Melee weapon during the same combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an opponent has more resources than you, pay 1 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, destroy an ally in your party and pay 1 to complete this quest.; Reward: Your hero heals damage from itself equal to that ally's health.

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.; Reward: You and target opponent each put the top card of your decks in your resource rows face down and exhausted.

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, put 1 damage on each of three different allies in your party and pay 1 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 2 to complete this quest.; Reward: Choose a hero or ally in your party. Damage that character would deal is unpreventable this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy two of your resources and pay 1 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you played an equipment this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you played an ability this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the other on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 7 to complete this quest.; Reward: Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed ability, ally, equipment, and quest card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Activate] > Choose one of your quests. Gurok the Usurper has that quest's powers this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you played an ally this turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Put a random card from your graveyard into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 6 to complete this quest.; Reward: Roll six dice one at a time from 6 inches above play. For each die that lands on an opposing ally, put damage on it equal to that roll.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Choose ability, ally, equipment, or quest. Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed card of that kind into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 0 to complete this quest.; Reward: Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put one on top of your deck and the other on the bottom.

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, pay 6 to complete this quest.; Reward: Put three Mechanical Chicken ally tokens with 0 ATK / 1 health into play. At the start of your next turn, remove them from the game and draw a card for each token removed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 2 to complete this quest.; Reward: If you have no ready resources, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 2 to complete this quest.; Reward: All players shuffle their graveyards into their decks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.; Reward: Turn target quest face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put 3 damage on your hero and pay 1 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: If you control an ability, ally, or equipment, draw a card, or two cards if you control all three.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Choose up to two players. Each of them draws a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an ally in your party was destroyed this turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an opposing ally was destroyed this turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 4 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card, or two cards if a Demon is in your party.
